verses.roman:
sei kṛṣṇa tumi sākṣāt--ihā nirdhārila
eta kahi' vipra prabhura caraṇe paḍila

synonyms: sei—that; kṛṣṇa—the Personality of Godhead, Kṛṣṇa; tumi—You; sākṣāt—directly; ihā—this; nirdhārila—concluded; eta kahi'-saying this; vipra—the brāhmaṇa; prabhura—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; caraṇe—at the lotus feet; padila—fell down.
translation: The brāhmaṇa concluded, "Sir, You are that Lord Kṛṣṇa Himself. This is my conclusion." Saying this, the brāhmaṇa fell down at the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
